overview:
About Mr. Sim

Mr. Jonathan Sim is the Director of the Finance, Human Resource and Administration Department of OG8 Asia Pte Ltd, a leading creative advertising agency in Singapore, established since 2008. He is a graduate from Nanyang Technological University with a Bachelor of Accountancy. He is also a member of the Institute of Certified Public Accountants of Singapore (ICPAS) and the Information Systems Audit and Control Association ISACA).

Areas of Practice

Mr. Simâ€™s practice covers a broad spectrum of Business and Corporate Advisory Services. His key focus includes family dispute resolution, valuations including Intellectual Property valuation, mergers, acquisitions and divestitures and corporate restructuring.
